metadata.name: Full Stack Development Pipeline
metadata.description: End-to-end feature development workflow coordinating frontend, backend, testing, and deployment with multiple specialized agents.

workflow.description: Automated full stack development pipeline workflow

steps.action: Break down feature requirements into frontend, backend, and database tasks
Design system architecture, API contracts, and database schema
Create optimized database schema with migrations and indexes
Implement backend API endpoints with TypeScript and proper type safety
Build responsive UI components with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS
Write comprehensive unit, integration, and E2E tests with >90% coverage
Perform code review for quality, performance, and best practices
Run security audit for vulnerabilities and OWASP compliance
Deploy to production with CI/CD pipeline and monitoring setup

benefits: Coordinated multi-agent approach ensures consistency across stack layers
Built-in quality gates at each stage (testing, review, security)
Automated deployment pipeline reduces manual errors
Type-safe implementation from database to UI
Scalable architecture designed by specialized architect agent

prerequisites: Project initialized with Next.js or similar framework

license.terms: Free to use with Wizard of AI subscription
